title: How to Get Unlimited Money in Clash of Clans

steps.title: Go to settings and go on Wi-fi and click the blue i button on your internet.
steps.content: Go to settings and go on Wi-fi and click the blue i button on your internet.

steps.title: Click DNS.
steps.content: Click DNS. Erase it (it will come back when you don't want to play on the server anymore).

steps.title: Go on Clash of Clans.
steps.content: Go on Clash of Clans. As soon as you enter, it will say downloading content. When it is done, a blue and red skull logo will come and then it will say: DARK$OULS Server - you get to choose what loot amounts you want.
